entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find References additional filter options #63875
  • Provide a Class Implementation for an Interface on (ctrl+.) #63874
  • No Usage Analysis for Constant Fields #63873
  • Auto Complete for missing interface properties/methods #63872
  • Where is the option that "Always on" Renaming Filename when renaming symbol? #63871
  • For C#, the compiler should allow returning a single named value and suggest the name for a local variable #63870
  • WASM CI build failure: "ReleaseMutex failed" in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn4.0 #63863
  • API/behavior changes needed to enable LSP pull diagnostics in 17.5 #63861
    17.5
  • Unexpected warning CS0034: Operator '-' is ambiguous on operand of type 'nuint' and 'int' #63860
  • Document Outline for C#: selected sort is lost when switching document #63859
  • Revert disabling of duplicate analyzer ref diagnostic #63856

Closed

  • String.Empty vs string.Empty #63866
  • C# Editor: references number location realated with attributes #63868
  • C# ternary operator suggest #63867
  • Field and property initialization order optimization (C# compiler) #63864
  • Support "remove unused references/packages" #6763
    Backlog
  • `CommandLineArgumentReader` doesn't add `analyzerconfig`s on the "best effort" path #63855
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid a first-chance exception if the PE reference doesn't exist #63878
    Area-IDE
  • Add a separate scouting integration CI yml #63877
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fixes implementation of With methods of recoverable trees #63876
    Area-IDE
  • Do not go back from Solution snapshot to Workspace in Metadata-as-Source #63869
    Area-IDE
  • Fix integration tests by not listening to value changed for old UI #63865
    Area-IDE
  • Use frozen partial semantic for import completion in OOP #63862
    Area-IDE
  • Move diagnostic tagging to 'pull diagnostics' #63858
    Area-IDE
  • Guard against a regular stack overflow exception in ControlFlowGraphBuilder. #63854
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Change test import ordering based on runtime globalization library #63853
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63794
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #63688
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63843
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Disable duplicate analyzer warning #63857
    Area-Analyzers, Next
  • Stop performing LOC on 17.3 branch and start localizing 17.4. #63839
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63880
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879
  • Enforce SetsRequiredMembers nullability on implicit chained constructors #63790
    Area-Compilers
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Ban api #62921
    Area-IDE
  • Support rename and resolve multiple symbols in one solution snapshot #63588
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Semantic snippets - prop snippet #63838
    Area-IDE
  • Propagate EffectiveScope to parameters of anonymous delegate types. #63787
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Move to platform background work indicator #63629
    Area-IDE
  • Move todo-comments onto LSP. #63784
    Area-IDE
  • Fix completion service for providers with text view roles #63685
    Area-IDE
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers
  • Clean up implementation of SymbolInfo #63698
    Area-Compilers
  • Use the term 'parameter' instead of 'formal parameter' #63825
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - for loop snippet #62990
    Area-IDE
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Non positional option for Convert To Record #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
